00012 #ifndef IF_OUTPUT_H_
00013 #define IF_OUTPUT_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Abstract base class for interface output types. Derived classes should  *
00017  * implement methods adding branches holding variables, opening closing    *
00018  * files and writing an event to disk.                                     *
00019  *                                                                         *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 #include <Camgen/ps_gen_base.h>
00023 
00024 namespace Camorra
00025 {
00027 
00028     template<class model_t>class interface_output
00029     {
00030         public:
00031 
00032             /* Type definitions: */
00033 
00034             typedef model_t model_type;
00035             typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00036             typedef vector<value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00037             typedef typename std::vector<value_type>::iterator weight_iterator;
00038             typedef typename std::vector<value_type>::const_iterator const_weight_iterator;
00039 
00041 
00042             const std::string file_name;
00043 
00045 
00046             std::string description;
00047 
00049 
00050             interface_output(const std::string& file_name_):file_name(file_name_){}
00051 
00053 
00054             interface_output(const std::string& file_name_,const std::string description_):file_name(file_name_),description(description_){}
00055 
00057 
00058             virtual ~interface_output(){}
00059 
00061 
00062             virtual interface_output<model_t>* create(const std::string& file_name_) const=0;
00063 
00065 
00066             virtual bool open_file()=0;
00067 
00069 
00070             virtual bool close_file()=0;
00071 
00073 
00074             virtual bool branch(const momentum_type*,const std::string&){}
00075 
00077 
00078             virtual bool branch(const value_type*,const std::string&){}
00079 
00081 
00082             virtual bool branch(const int*,const std::string&){}
00083 
00085 
00086             virtual bool branch(const bool*,const std::string&){}
00087 
00089 
00090             virtual bool write_event(){}
00091 
00094 
00095             virtual bool write_event(const ps_generator_base<model_t>* gen)
00096             {
00097                 return write_event();
00098             }
00099     };
00100 }
